title: Quick beef steak chilli con carne
description: Adding beef steaks to this quick chilli con carne recipe gives a luxurious twist on the classic – for when you are pushed for time but don’t want to compromise on flavour.
ingredients: 215g can kidney beans, drained and rinsed

method.Step 1: In a medium bowl, mix together vegetable oil, paprika and ground cumin. Slice steaks, add to the bowl, season and mix together. Set aside for 10 minutes to marinate.

method.Step 2: Heat a large frying pan over a medium heat, add the marinated beef and stir-fry for 1-2 minutes until browned. Stir in kidney beans, tomatoes and a splash of water. Simmer for 5 minutes, until the tomatoes are softened. Stir in some coriander, divide between plates and top each with a coriander sprig.

method.Step 3: Serve with boiled basmati rice and a spoonful of guacamole.
